br.com.challenge.controller

Class InvoiceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.challenge.controller.InvoiceController

  • @Component
 @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/invoices")
public class InvoiceController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for mapping and controller the Rest requests of Invoices
    Author:
    Gustavo Luis dos Santos
